page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: The area of this land is in Cheshire. It covers Nether Alderley and most of Over Alderley it is mainly country side and farmland but there is a main road going through Nether Alderley. It is the A34. There are no shops in this area, but there are some 2 miles away in Alderley Edge.On the A34 there is the ICI. It is a large industrial complex that deals in drugs. Lots of people near by work there. There are different types of houses mostly cottages but there are some modern cottages too. There is a mill owned by the National Trust that you can look around. Opposite the mill is St Mary's church.There are 2 schools. On the edge is The Wizard Restaurant and an information centre.
